name: Confirmed Cases
description: Number of confirmed COVID-19 cases, data from the European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control

name: @CoronaSurveys Estimate
description: Number of cases, estimated from polls after outlier removal and considering a weighted average of each reported proportion

name: @CoronaSurveys Estimate
description: Number of cases, estimated from polls after outlier removal and considering a simple average of each reported proportion

name: @CoronaSurveys Estimate
description: Number of cases, estimated from polls after outlier removal and considering a standard (Dunbar number) number of acquaintances from each respondent

name: Fatalities*400 Estimate
description: Estimate obtained by multiplying the cumulative number of fatalities by 400

name: cCFR Estimate
description: Estimate corrected case fatality ratio, based on number of fatalities
